snippet.title: Scott Pilgrim - Bonus Content Trailer
snippet.description:
Knives Chau is now playable in the Scott Pilgrim game. See her in action and find out what else comes with the new downloadable content.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
